name: resensitize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make someone sensitive to (= aware of or affected by) something again: The purpose of the violence in her plays is to resensitise people to what violence is. All these foods are rich in fibre to balance your blood sugar and re-sensitize your cells to insulin. Compare
desensitize
More examplesFewer examplesOur aim in this film was to re-sensitize people to the precious nature of human life and not to waste time being afraid.His war film tries to resensitise its viewers towards violence.You need to re-sensitize yourself to your "inner thermostat" so you stop eating food when you're full.
